entry.title: 5 Reasons You Should Get Surveillance Cameras For Your Home And Business
entry.content:
Surveillance cameras are useful for a number of reasons. The first and foremost is security. Even if you don’t think you need these cameras, the moment you do buy security cameras from shops like Arlo for your home and business, you will feel relieved. If you still need that extra push to buy surveillance cameras, let’s take a look at 5 reasons you must.

1 . Deters Theft
If home and business have surveillance cameras, that is security in itself. The presence of it lets any potential thief know that if they were to attempt to steal anything, they could be recognized through the security footage. If the security footage is being watched in real-time, they would be caught immediately.

You would also notice suspicious attempts beforehand. If someone is walking aimlessly outside your house for days, it should be a first warning sign. Surveillance cameras also discourage shoplifters.

2. Activity tracker
You can check when your employees are coming in to work and when they are leaving. This also applies to your home; you can check if your domestic worker is performing his or her duties as expected. The presence of security cameras would also encourage them to work harder in general. If the security cameras are hidden from view and they are unaware of it, you can determine how serious they are about their work.

3. Recording Evidence
On the off chance that thievery does occur, you would have security footage to determine who stole your possessions and when. This is a great way for businesses to retrieve any lost paperwork. Later, in court, footage from security cameras could also be used as evidence.

4. Improves Workplace Safety
You can keep track of all that your employees are doing. From the security footage, you can see if there are conflicts among the employees through their body language- even if you can’t hear what they are talking about. You can make sure that everyone behaves appropriately and conducts themselves in a professional manner. As pointed out before, the mere presence of security cameras deters employees from behaving in a way that’s unbecoming of them.

5. Checking How Your Family Is Doing

If you have kids at home, smart surveillance cameras allow you to check the live security footage from anywhere. You could be at work and still see how your pets or your children are doing at home. It is natural to feel anxious about your family, even if there are caretakers. So, the presence of security cameras is reassuring and should help you focus better on work.

 

Final Thoughts
There are many different types of surveillance cameras in the market. Their price range also varies, allowing you to find one that’s tailored to your needs. For your home, we would recommend Essentials Indoor Camera from Arlo as it comes with a privacy shield. When you are at home, you can close the privacy shutter and disable the audio with simple clicks to get total privacy. There are also other types such as Ultra 2 Spotlight for outside surveillance. The cameras from Arlo come with an internet connection, HD vision, night vision, Bluetooth connection, and weather protection, which makes it the best choice.
